item.title: A sweet cat for a sweet girl
item.dc:creator: benkn
item.content:encoded: Yesterday, Emily told me a sweet story about Mittens falling into the hot tub. Poor thing started in after rubbing heads with Sarah, but they caught her after just her hind legs got wet. They carried her inside to the laundry room and dried her off. They let her stay in temporarily too, and now she always stays at the back door meowing to come in. Emily has finally warmed up to her too, appreciating her lovable nature. She hopes they adopt her, but doesn't think their Dad will do it. And Maggie would have a conniption for sure! I wish Emily could take her and bring her to me. I'd love to have her.
